verses.verse: <S%H8085>Hear<s%>, O <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: Thou art to pass <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> this <S%H3117>day<s%>, to go <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H1419>greater<s%> and <S%H6099>mightier<s%> than thyself, <S%H5892>cities<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and fenced <S%H1219>up<s%> to <S%H8064>heaven<s%>,

A <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H7311>tall<s%>, the <S%H1121>children<s%> of the <S%H6062>Anakims<s%>, whom thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%>, and of whom thou hast <S%H8085>heard<s%> say, Who can <S%H3320>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H6061>Anak<s%>!

<S%H3045>Understand<s%> therefore this <S%H3117>day<s%>, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> is he which goeth <S%H5674>over<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee; as a <S%H398>consuming<s%> <S%H784>fire<s%> he shall <S%H8045>destroy<s%> them, and he shall bring them <S%H3665>down<s%> before thy <S%H6440>face<s%>: so shalt thou drive them <S%H3423>out<s%>, and <S%H6>destroy<s%> them <S%H4118>quickly<s%>, as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1696>said<s%> unto thee.

<S%H559>Speak<s%> not thou in thine <S%H3824>heart<s%>, after that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> hath cast them <S%H1920>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, <S%H559>saying<s%>, For my <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath brought me <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> this <S%H776>land<s%>: but for the <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> of these <S%H1471>nations<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> doth drive them <S%H3423>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> thee.

Not for thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>, or for the <S%H3476>uprightness<s%> of thine <S%H3824>heart<s%>, dost thou <S%H935>go<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> their <S%H776>land<s%>: but for the <S%H7564>wickedness<s%> of these <S%H1471>nations<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> doth drive them <S%H3423>out<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> thee, and that he may <S%H6965>perform<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7650>sware<s%> unto thy <S%H1>fathers<s%>, <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>.

<S%H3045>Understand<s%> therefore, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>giveth<s%> thee not this <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it for thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%>; for thou art a <S%H6203%H7186>stiffnecked<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>.

Â¶ <S%H2142>Remember<s%>, and <S%H7911>forget<s%> not, how thou provokedst the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> thy <S%H430>God<s%> to <S%H7107>wrath<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>: <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> that thou didst depart <S%H3318>out<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, until ye <S%H935>came<s%> unto this <S%H4725>place<s%>, ye have been <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> <S%H5973>against<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
Also in <S%H2722>Horeb<s%> ye <S%H7107>provoked<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H7107>wrath<s%>, so that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H599>angry<s%> with you to have <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> you.

When I was gone <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H2022>mount<s%> to <S%H3947>receive<s%> the <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%>, even the <S%H3871>tables<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> with you, then I <S%H3427>abode<s%> in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%>, I neither did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%> nor <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>:

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>delivered<s%> unto me <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> with the <S%H676>finger<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%>; and on them was written according to all the <S%H1697>words<s%>, which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spake<s%> with you in the <S%H2022>mount<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H784>fire<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly<s%>.

And it came to pass at the <S%H7093>end<s%> of <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%>, that the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> me the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of <S%H68>stone<s%>, even the <S%H3871>tables<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, get thee <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4118>quickly<s%> from hence; for thy <S%H5971>people<s%> which thou hast brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> have <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> themselves; they are <S%H4118>quickly<s%> turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> which I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them; they have <S%H6213>made<s%> them a molten <S%H4541>image<s%>.

Furthermore the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spake<s%> unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>, I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> this <S%H5971>people<s%>, and, behold, it is a <S%H6203%H7186>stiffnecked<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>:

Let me <S%H7503>alone<s%>, that I may <S%H8045>destroy<s%> them, and blot <S%H4229>out<s%> their <S%H8034>name<s%> from under <S%H8064>heaven<s%>: and I will <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H854>of<s%> thee a <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H6099>mightier<s%> and <S%H7227>greater<s%> than they.

So I <S%H6437>turned<s%> and came <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mount<s%>, and the <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H1197>burned<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%>: and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of the <S%H1285>covenant<s%> were in my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%>.

And I <S%H7200>looked<s%>, and, behold, ye had <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and had <S%H6213>made<s%> you a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H5695>calf<s%>: ye had turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> <S%H4118>quickly<s%> out of the <S%H1870>way<s%> which the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you.

And I <S%H8610>took<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%>, and <S%H7993>cast<s%> them out <S%H5921>of<s%> my <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3027>hands<s%>, and <S%H7665>brake<s%> them before your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

And I fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, as at the <S%H7223>first<s%>, <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%>: I did neither <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H3899>bread<s%>, nor <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%>, because of all your <S%H2403>sins<s%> which ye <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, in <S%H6213>doing<s%> <S%H7451>wickedly<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, to provoke him to <S%H3707>anger<s%>.

For I was <S%H3025>afraid<s%> <S%H6440>of<s%> the <S%H639>anger<s%> and hot <S%H2534>displeasure<s%>, wherewith the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H7107>wroth<s%> against you to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> you. But the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> unto me at that <S%H6471>time<s%> also.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H599>angry<s%> with <S%H175>Aaron<s%> to have <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> him: and I <S%H6419>prayed<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> also the same <S%H6256>time<s%>.

And I <S%H3947>took<s%> your <S%H2403>sin<s%>, the <S%H5695>calf<s%> which ye had <S%H6213>made<s%>, and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> it with <S%H784>fire<s%>, and <S%H3807>stamped<s%> it, and <S%H2912>ground<s%> it very <S%H3190>small<s%>, even until it was as <S%H1854>small<s%> as <S%H6083>dust<s%>: and I <S%H7993>cast<s%> the <S%H6083>dust<s%> thereof into the <S%H5158>brook<s%> that descended <S%H3381>out<s%> of the <S%H2022>mount<s%>.
And at <S%H8404>Taberah<s%>, and at <S%H4532>Massah<s%>, and at <S%H6914>Kibroth-hattaavah<s%>, ye provoked the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> to <S%H7107>wrath<s%>.

Likewise when the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> you from <S%H6947>Kadesh-barnea<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Go <S%H5927>up<s%> and <S%H3423>possess<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> which I have <S%H5414>given<s%> you; then ye <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> against the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%>, and ye <S%H539>believed<s%> him not, nor <S%H8085>hearkened<s%> to his <S%H6963>voice<s%>.
Ye have been <S%H4784>rebellious<s%> against the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> from the <S%H3117>day<s%> that I <S%H3045>knew<s%> you.

Thus I fell <S%H5307>down<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> and <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H3915>nights<s%>, as I fell <S%H5307>down<s%> at the first; because the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> he would <S%H8045>destroy<s%> you.

I <S%H6419>prayed<s%> therefore unto the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, <S%H7843>destroy<s%> not thy <S%H5971>people<s%> and thine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, which thou hast <S%H6299>redeemed<s%> through thy <S%H1433>greatness<s%>, which thou hast brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand<s%>.

<S%H2142>Remember<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants<s%>, <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>; <S%H6437>look<s%> not unto the <S%H7190>stubbornness<s%> of this <S%H5971>people<s%>, nor to their <S%H7562>wickedness<s%>, nor to their <S%H2403>sin<s%>:

Lest the <S%H776>land<s%> whence thou broughtest us <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H559>say<s%>, Because the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was not <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> them into the <S%H776>land<s%> which he <S%H1696>promised<s%> them, and because he <S%H8135>hated<s%> them, he hath brought them <S%H3318>out<s%> to <S%H4191>slay<s%> them in the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%>.

Yet they are thy <S%H5971>people<s%> and thine <S%H5159>inheritance<s%>, which thou broughtest <S%H3318>out<s%> by thy <S%H1419>mighty<s%> <S%H3581>power<s%> and by thy stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> <S%H2220>arm<s%>.
